document.full_text: after a late-night trip to the dentist during which he endured two root canals, tampa bay forward martin st. louis vowed at thursday to even the score a day after a 3-0 loss to pittsburgh.
document.title: n.h.l. roundup: canadiens' price and sabres' miller open playoffs with shutout victories
lines_and_colors: after a late-night trip to the dentist during which he endured two root canals, tampa bay forward martin st. louis vowed at thursday to even the score a day after a 3-0 loss to pittsburgh.
